listing.listing_description: Fold wall-to-wall balcony doors open and fill trendy interiors with fresh mountain air and sea breeze from the coast of Rancho Palos Verdes. Lookout out over scenic vistas of California’s rugged coast, bluffs, and the Pacific. In the evening, sink into a leather armchair next to the fireplace and watch the sunset. Then, head to the ocean-front bars of Redondo Beach.From the back wall kitchen, you’ll have a clear gaze out of the ocean-side wall, as well as a barrier-free connection to the rest of the group in the living room. Hardwood floors, designers furnishings, and California-inspired works of art connect each area beneath Maritime’s peaked-ceiling. Outside, you’ll find a small sitting area with a sofa, sun loungers, and a fire pit.Located within the peninsula’s gated-community, you’ll travel down a private road to access the villa, where 2 garage parking spots await. When you’re not enjoying the view, check what’s on cable or Smart TV. Or you could turn up the sound system, fire up the grill, and throw an afternoon barbeque. There’s also an office space if you feel like keeping up with the rest of the World.If you’re traveling with kids, Disneyland and Universal studios are always exciting options. For the bigger kids, spend a romantic evening at Balboa Pier. Have a burger and milkshake at Ruby’s Diner, play some classic arcade games, then hit the Ferris wheel. Closer to home, Cabrillo Pier is an incredible walk 1200-feet out into the Pacific, and its 2 beaches are perfect for swimming and surfing.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The perfect home base for your large group, this South Tahoe estate is like having a mountain resort all to yourself. Inside, there are numerous lounge areas, a well-equipped games room that leads to a home theatre, an indoor pool, hot tub, and sauna, and nine luxurious bedrooms. Outside, several balconies and living spaces capture soaring mountain views. Within a five minute walk, you’ll find world-class skiing at the base of Heavenly Mountain Resort. And, within just ten miles, you’ll have access to Lakeside Beach, Lake Tahoe Golf Course, and South Tahoe’s vibrant downtown area.First and foremost, Saddle Estate is mountain luxury at its finest. Rustic elements like rock walls, cedar siding, granite counters, wood flooring, and plush leather furniture give the house that natural warmth you look for in a ski vacation. On the flip side, Saddle Estate’s high-end electronics, stainless steel appliances, and modern architectural take on the traditional ski lodge make this mountain home a stylish standout. You’ll love the open concept layout and all the extra space it creates for your large group.At dinner, Saddle Estate’s spacious kitchen is sure to inspire culinary creativity with its restaurant caliber appliances and functional layout. The formal dining area is just beyond the breakfast bar, a large contemporary picnic style table, with seating for eighteen. Outside, there’s a built-in barbecue, and a fire pit, in case you feel like doing some grilling.Whether you’re in town to ski, golf, or enjoy the dynamic natural landscape, South Tahoe is always an exciting vacation destination. The best spot to enjoy the lake is Lakeside Beach. There, you’ll find calm water and a vast stretch of sand outfitted with picnic tables, gazebos, and the Lakeside Grill. After a day by the lake, head to downtown South Tahoe for dinner and drinks, their nightlife scene is buzzing all year round. With everything from fine dining to dance clubs and dive bars, South Tahoe has something for everyone.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.PERMIT #7715

listing.listing_description: Find a home away from home in Steamboat Springs at Sunshine Peak Chalet. This newly built Colorado vacation rental close to the heart of the Steamboat mountain village welcomes groups of up to twelve with cozy, comfortable interiors and four bedrooms. Take advantage of the 3-minute drive to the nearest ski lift for a holiday on the slopes, or the spaces designed for entertaining by hosting a family reunion or getaway with friends.Stellar amenities at the villa will put you at ease. Your stay at Sunshine Peak Chalet includes complimentary ski shuttle service during the winter. The villa has a flat-screen television, video game console and sound system for après-ski lounging, as well as a gas fireplace. For laid-back evenings in warmer weather, head out to the private deck, which has a barbecue, hot tub and incredible mountain views. Practical touches like boot dryers mean you’ll never have to start the day with wet gear.You’ll want to spend most of your time in the villa’s open-plan great room, where large windows frame the mountains and a stone gas fireplace lends a warm, welcoming vibe. Take in the views from the leather sofa and snug wingback chairs, or gather around the dining table, which seats ten in rustic cane-seat chairs. The fully equipped kitchen will impress with a spacious island layout, custom cabinets, granite countertops and gourmet appliances.Sunshine Peak Chalet has two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, perfect for couples, and two that share a bathroom, great for parents that want to keep an eye on kids. Larger groups can use the sofa bed in the media room or a roll-away twin bed for additional space. Soft tones like mauve and taupe and details such as sleek four-poster beds give the bedrooms a feel of quiet luxury.Once nicknamed Ski Town USA, Steamboat is known for its powder. And with Steamboat Ski Resort a 3-minute drive from the villa and the Thunderhead lift 5 minutes away by car, you won’t miss out on any of the action. But the region is also known for its eponymous hot springs, from the family-friendly Old Town Steamboat Springs to the honeymoon-worthy natural pools at Strawberry Park. There’s plenty to do in the summer, too, from hiking to golf at the nearby Rollingstone Ranch course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Doc's Holiday is an extraordinary alpine chalet at Big Sky Resort in Montana, situated just fifty feet from Alpine Meadows Run and a short walk from Moonlight Basin Clubhouse. The villa is superbly appointed for a winter or summer getaway, with an outdoor hot tub, alfresco dining, and beautifully appointed interiors with high-end features for cooking and entertainment. Two master suites, a kids' bunkroom, and a media room with extra bedding accommodate up to nine guests in total comfort. At additional cost, guests enjoy access to the amenities at Moonlight Basin Clubhouse, including a fitness center, outdoor pool, and Jack Nicklaus Signature Golf Course.Secluded amid beautiful pine woods, the villa gazes out on sweeping valley and mountain views from its cavernous great room. The open-concept space features an ample lounge with fireplace, a table for six, and a superb kitchen with high-end stainless steel appliances, a copper sink, a wine fridge, and a lovely breakfast bar. The décor is exquisite throughout the chalet, with thick wood beams, beautiful alpine-themed artwork, and an antler chandelier above the dining table. Outside, the generous deck welcomes alfresco meals on summer evenings, while the hot tub invites you to soothing soaks under the majestic sky.The master suite opens directly to the main deck and features a fireplace, king bed, and ensuite bathroom. The second master opens to the outdoor hot tub and also includes a king bed, fireplace, and ensuite bathroom. The kids' room enjoys easy access to the hot tub and ski path; it features a twin-over-queen bunk bed, a rollaway twin-size bed, and an ensuite bathroom. The media room—also on the lower level—has a queen sleeper sofa, TV, video game console, and ensuite bathroom.The villa also includes a large storage room for ski and snowboard equipment. You're fifty feet from Alpine Meadows Run and a six-minute drive to the base of Big Sky Resort. Moonlight Basin Clubhouse is about a ten-minute walk from your door, and you're less than eight miles from Big Sky town.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perfect for large groups of family and friends, this spacious luxury lodge features seven bedrooms, multiple lounge areas, and a 20 personal-seat home theatre connected to a well-stocked game room and bar. Outside, California’s dynamic climate allows South Tahoe to enjoy beach and alpine lifestyles. And, Looking Heavenly’s location makes it easy to find golf, beachfront, ski access, and all of the beautiful small towns around Lake Tahoe, all within a few miles.From the rooftop dining/lounge, you’ll appreciate uninterrupted views of Heavenly Mountain Resort while resting by the fireplace, or enjoying an alfresco meal. Underneath Heavenly’s rooftop terrace, you’ll find a spiral staircase leading to an outdoor kitchenette with built-in barbecue; this area also has a fireplace with a lovely little sitting area and scenic view. Inside, vaulted ceilings, exposed wood, leather furniture, and natural stone fireplaces deliver, in luxurious fashion, the warm and inviting atmosphere of a traditional ski lodge.Looking Heavenly is outfitted with a fully equipped kitchen, formal dining for fourteen, Wi-Fi, cable television, and a rejuvenating hot tub. And, with its seven bedrooms and six and a half bathrooms, Looking Heavenly can accommodate up to sixteen guests with ease.Lakeside Beach, just eight minutes away, is the perfect setting for an afternoon picnic. Its calm waters and lengthy stretch of sand are ideal for safe swimming and family fun. There’s also a restaurant on the beach called Lakeside Beach Grill if you’d rather skip the food preparation and focus on fun in the sun. If it’s skiing you’re after, Heavenly Mountain is just two minutes from home, you’ll be able to see it from the rooftop patio, and Northstar and Squaw Valley are close by as well. After a day on the beach, or the mountain, head into town for South Tahoe’s exciting nightlife. You’ll find everything from nightclubs to dive bars and everything in between in South Tahoe. And, if you’re feeling lucky, it’s just an hour from Reno.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.PERMIT #7956

listing.listing_description: Twilight Peak, located within the renowned One Steamboat Place complex, is a beautiful luxury vacation rental with views of the Yampa Valley and extremely convenient access to the Steamboat slopes. With four bedrooms that sleep eleven, it's ideal for large families or groups of friends seeking the cozy privacy of a home base during a Colorado adventure.Tall glass doors illuminate the suite's beautiful open-plan living area, opening to a private patio with barbeque grill and lovely valley views. Inside, the elegant dining table for ten, with red wooden chairs and a large leather bench seat, is ideal for hearty dinners together. Beside it, the large sectional couch and two leather armchairs surround the suite's central stone hearth, with fireplace and mounted flat screen television, where you'll stay toasty while sharing nighttime laughs. The kitchen comes fully equipped with Viking appliances and a breakfast bar for three.The light-filled master bedroom is located on its own side of the suite, and includes a king bed, a stone hearth with gas fireplace and flat screen television, a walk-in closet, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone steam shower and jetted bathtub. One the other side of the suite, there are two other bedrooms with king bed and ensuite bathrooms—one with stand-alone shower and bath, one with shower/bath combo—and a fourth room with two twin-over-double bunk beds and shared access to the hall bathroom, ideal for kids.At Twilight Peak, you'll savor One Steamboat Place's world-class communal areas, epitomizing Rocky Mountain class. In the evening, relax in the stunning Great Room by the massive stone hearth flanked by two-story windows with beautiful views, or shoot billiards in the game parlor while your kids enjoy the Little Tykes room.The main entrance of One Steamboat Place is just a minute's walk from Steamboat Gondola, giving you unrivaled access to some of the best skiing in the world. After the winter thaw, Rolling Stone Golf Course awaits you less than two miles away. City Market and Steamboat Springs Old Town are also just minutes away by car, as is Steamboat Springs Airport. And after a few hard days on the mountains, treat yourself to Mother Nature's healing touch at Strawberry Park Natural Hot Springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find a contemporary escape amid quintessential wine-country landscape at Bella Vista Sonoma. This sleek, modern retreat sits atop a hill outside Santa Rosa, in a private setting that’s nevertheless just an hour from San Francisco. Like a fine wine with a gourmet meal, its luxury amenities and stunning natural surroundings are the perfect pairing.You’ll have no trouble slipping into the indoor-outdoor California lifestyle in the villa’s beautifully appointed al-fresco spaces. Spend days swimming in the pool or lounging on the terrace, and evenings tending the barbecue in the outdoor kitchen, cozying up to the fireplace or soaking in the hot tub. Younger guests will want to spend hours in the children’s play area and media room, and for adults, there are toys like an Apple TV and Sonos sound system.An open-concept layout, dramatic 12-foot ceilings and wraparound windows bring the views to the forefront of the villa’s great room. Gather in the sitting area around the fireplace to watch a favorite film on the retractable movie screen, relive the day’s adventures in dining chairs with mid-century cred or satisfy appetites in a fully equipped kitchen with professional-grade appliances. On warmer evenings, you can also barbecue and dine on the enclosed porch.The master bedroom at Bella Vista Sonoma is a honeymoon-worthy suite with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, al-fresco shower and its own balcony. There’s a second bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, and the third bedroom has two twin beds and a shared hall bathroom. Larger parties of extended family or friends on holiday together can also use the guest room, which has a queen sofa bed and shares the hall bathroom.This one-of-a-kind vacation rental may feel peaceful and remote, but it’s only 15 minutes from shopping, dining and nightlife in Sebastopol and Guerneville, and 20 minutes from Healdsburg. Set a course for Annabel State Park, Sonoma Valley Regional Park or a nearby golf club—or simply drive through Napa and Sonoma, taking in the scenery and stopping at wineries along the way.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This exquisite Ketchum penthouse is located within Chilali, a fabulous complex of condos with five-star amenities just minutes from Sun Valley Resort. Your private, 3,111 square-foot vacation rental is superbly appointed for a winter or summer vacation, featuring spacious living areas, indoor and alfresco dining, and a superb gourmet kitchen. Three ample king bedroom suites plus a kid-friendly bunkroom offer ideal accommodations for families with children and large groups of friends. Additionally, guests enjoy access to the outstanding communal amenities at Chilali, including two rooftop hot tubs, a rooftop dining area with grill, and a well-equipped gym with sauna.After an exhilarating day on the Sun Valley slopes or hiking trails, enjoy delightful evenings with loved ones in total privacy. The open-concept living room features high ceilings, ample cathedral windows with gorgeous views of Bald Mountain, and a lovely stone hearth with fireplace and mounted flat-screen TV. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and serves a dining table for eight. The deck features a barbeque grill, alfresco dining, and lounge furniture for savoring the summer sun and delicious winter air. Downstairs, the comfy and spacious home theater with vintage décor is perfect for family movie night.The master suite boasts a king bed, large windows with mountain views, a walk-in closet, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bathtub. The primary guest suite features a king bed and spacious ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, while the other king guest room has access to a hall bathroom. The large bunk room includes four twin bunk beds.Chilali’s ideal location places you within walking distance of downtown Ketchum and Magic Lantern Cinemas, and you’re an easy drive to Elkhorn Village, Elkhorn Golf Course, and much more. You're within three to five minutes by car (or by Ketchum's free shuttle service) of Bald Mountain, Dollar Mountain, and River Run lodge at Sun Valley Resort. The resort abounds in outdoor sports in all seasons, including downhill and cross-country skiing, snowshoeing, biking, hiking, ice-skating, and fly-fishing.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Glenwood Mansion is a large, stunning villa in South Lake Tahoe. Situated in a serene, private setting, yet close to some of the finest skiing, golf, and beaches in the Mountain West, the villa has the feel of a private resort, with an indoor swimming pool, high-end spa facilities, and outstanding amenities for relaxation, entertainment, and play. Thirteen deluxe bedrooms sleep thirty-four, making Glenwood Mansion an ideal vacation rental for multiple families and destination wedding guests.The villa's design and décor exude classic alpine charm, with walls and ceilings of cedar wood, floors of exquisite stone, and elegant yet wonderfully cozy furnishings. Enjoy evenings in the spectacular great room in one of its sumptuous lounge areas, kindling a fire in the superb hearth and relishing the breathtaking views. Cook hearty meals in the gourmet kitchen and serve cocktails at the gorgeous, expansive bar. Then join each other at the beautiful dining table. At night, gather in the outstanding home theater, well appointed with leather armchairs and a large screen.Superb outdoor living areas, top-shelf spa facilities, and excellent sport and game amenities set Glenwood Mansion apart. Savor crisp mountain air on the terrace, soaking your body in the hot tub and relaxing in the lounge by the fireplace. Prepare meals and drinks at the outdoor kitchen, and dine at the alfresco table. Play bocce and basketball on summer afternoons, and pool and Ping-Pong on winter evenings. Reward your body in the sauna and massage room, and spend long hours by the indoor swimming pool, with adjacent media lounge and fireplace.Of the thirteen superb bedroom suites, nine feature ensuite bathrooms. Each of the two spectacular master suites includes a king bed, fireplace, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub; one opens to the terrace, while the other has a private balcony. There is also a bunk bed in the loft common room, perfect for kids.Glenwood Mansion balances serene privacy and total convenience in one of the world's finest alpine destinations. You're just minutes from the slopes at Heavenly Mountain Resort and from the shores of Lakeside Beach, Nevada Beach, and Zephyr Cove Beach. Golfers are within easy reach of Edgewood Tahoe Golf Course and Lake Tahoe Golf Course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.PERMIT #8141

listing.listing_description: Water splashes over the side of the infinity pool and burbles in a courtyard fountain at this custom-built residence close to downtown Austin. Glass walls offer up panoramas of Texas hill country, and carved wooden pieces bring craftsmanship from around the globe inside. Drive 11 miles to downtown for a free tour of the state capitol building or an evening out amid bungalows turned bars. Let your eyes wander over the wide-open spaces from outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, barbecue, and loungers; get cozy around the firepit in the private courtyard; and drape a blanket over a shady patch of the grounds for a nature-centered yoga practice. Entertain friends and family from the wet bar and smart TVs or take a moment for yourself with the help of the gas fireplace and Wi-Fi. This custom vacation rental is perfectly suited to its site, with glass walls neatly framing green hills and blue sky in the living and dining rooms. In the fully equipped kitchen, you’ll find windows over the sink instead of upper cabinets. Richly patterned area rugs and an eclectic mix of furnishings, from the farmhouse-inspired to contemporary, add personality throughout. There are 2 bedrooms in the main house of this luxury property, 1 in an annex, and 1 in a separate casita; all 4 bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms. The main house has 1 king bedroom and 1 queen bedroom, and the annex has a queen bed. The casita has a queen bed as well as a kitchenette and living area, making it ideal for in-laws on holiday with the rest of the family or a couple wanting a honeymoon-style escape.The villa is less than a 10-minute drive from 2 golf courses and less than a 10-mile drive from Zilker Park, where you’ll find the 3-acre limestone-traced expanse of Barton Springs Pool. It’s 11 miles to downtown Austin, where you can tour the state capitol and museums by day, and sample cocktails, barbecue, and more by night. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Resonating in complete harmony with its natural surroundings, Northside is a spacious, welcoming ski home in the exclusive Empire Pass community of Deer Valley. Five bedrooms and seven bathrooms make Northside the perfect vacation home for large groups and families. Add the private hot tub, ski-in/ski out access to the slopes and home theater, and this is shaping up to be your ideal mountain retreat.Spend social evenings in the mountain air, gathering in your private outdoor hot tub for chilled out drinks. Create dream vacation moments and wonderful memories under the starry Utah sky. Inside you have a super games room, complete with retro arcade machine. A games console is accompanied by a terrific big screen and cushy giant beanbags. Or congregate on the gorgeous u-shaped leather couch in Northside’s home theater for a laid-back movie night.The lounge is lovingly scattered with an eclectic mix of comfy armchairs and couches. Light a fire, put on your favorite tunes and gather here after an eventful day on the mountain. Fabulous views over the treetops give this space an even more magical feeling. Spacious and exceedingly well-equipped, the kitchen is an open, social and practical area while the dining area sits on its own polished platform and is prettily lit for a lovely evening meal ambiance. An extra reception room becomes whatever you want it to - a quiet spot to hide away with a book, a study for researching fun activities in Deer Valley or even an exercise room.Mountain views and traditional stone fireplaces make the two sumptuous king size rooms extra special. Enjoy views of the great outdoors, snug under your plush comforter. En-suites with jetted tubs complete the luxury experience. The twin is incredibly cozy, and houses a magnificent antique style wardrobe for all your vacation outfits. Like all the bedrooms, the superb queen also has an en-suite and a television. Charming alpine inspired bunk-beds call the fifth bedroom home, gifting plenty of sleeping space.Northside’s ideal ski-in/ski-out location is helpful in the mornings and absolute bliss at the end of a day on the mountain. Ski or board to your heart’s content on the perfectly groomed runs of Flagstaff Mountain. The Utah Olympic Park is nearby where you can experience the exhilarating thrill of the 2002 Olympic bobsleigh track. Take the dial-a-ride shuttle bus to Park City for shops, restaurants and entertainment.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Modern elegance meets simplicity and a great location with this hillside LA villa. Located in a renowned section of the Hollywood Hills, the peaceful Laurel Canyon area offers chilled vibes while retaining excellent access to the Sunset Strip. With interior space maximized, guests can enjoy an airy terrace and cooling pool, with parks, restaurants, hip bars and shopping options just minutes away.Entering into LA Supreme, guests are greeted with the clean aesthetic of an open welcome space, with a huge window beyond offering a view of the LA sunshine and Hollywood Hills. Sparse but stylish decor, including driftwood furniture and tastemaker artwork adorn the central living area, while a huge island adds character and utility to the kitchen area. The stone flooring gives way to softer, welcoming furnishings in the living room section of the villa, where soft seating allows for ideal relaxation. On the wraparound terrace outside, guests can savor delightful brunches at the convenient alfresco dining table, or relax in the sunny afternoon in the supplied recliners, which offer an impressive view of downtown LA in the distance.This part of LA offers a wealth of day-trip options for guests. Despite its proximity to such a major city, local options range from bracing canyon walks and hikes, to horseback excursions and ranch visits. The sheer number of bars, restaurants, art galleries, art installations, and theatres in the nearby districts makes for an almost limitless number of options for guests, while the nearby Walk of Fame and iconic Griffith Observatory are always popular options. Taking in the glittering lights of the City of Angels from the terrace is a great way to end your day, with the entire panorama of this fabled city spreading out in front of guests as night falls.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This extraordinary chalet enjoys a secluded setting at Big Sky Resort in Montana, with ski-in/ski-out access to White Otter Lift and sublime views of Lone Peak. The villa is superbly appointed for an alpine getaway in any season, featuring a sauna, game room, gourmet kitchen, and outdoor hot tub among other high-end amenities. Five spacious and cozy bedrooms plus a cozy kids' room accommodate up to eighteen guests, ideal for multiple families or large groups of friends.The cavernous great room balances antique grandeur with welcoming modern comforts. Leather sofas face the beautiful stone fireplace under a halo chandelier hanging from the high, wood-beamed ceilings, perfect for evening drinks after a long day on the slopes. An open kitchen with chef-grade appliances serves an island breakfast bar for five and a lovely dining table for ten. The downstairs family room is ideal for nighttime festivities, featuring a pool table, game table, hearth-warmed lounge, wet bar, and cozy wall-to-wall carpeting. Outdoors, the hot tub welcomes soothing soaks under the starry sky.The mountain-view master suite is located on the main level, featuring a king bed, a twin-size daybed, a private sitting area, and an ensuite bathroom with large shower, dual vanity, and soaking tub. There are three guestrooms on the upper level and two rooms (a guestroom and the kids' room) on the lower level. Various bedding arrangements and plentiful bathrooms provide comfortable accommodations for guests of all ages.The villa includes a three-car garage and a ski room with storage racks and boot dryers. Guests can ski directly onto the slopes near White Otter Lift, or drive about seven miles to the resort’s base and town center. The superb Moonlight Basin Clubhouse and Spanish Peaks Clubhouse are both within easy reach, featuring fitness and wellness amenities, superb dining, and some of the finest golf and outdoor sporting activities in the Mountain West.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Experience this modern and artfully-decorated home near the heart of LA’s technology hub at Silicon Docks. Care and attention-to-detail hasn’t been spared, with touches like the sculpted exterior furniture and indoor plant biosphere adding a dash of distinct style. Complete with refreshing pool and boldly spacious open-plan design, experience close access to famous beaches and local restaurants.The grand, high ceilings and unified, bright color scheme of this home help to make an instant impact on guests. An impression of plentiful space is conveyed through the combined kitchen, living and sitting room, while luxury is apparent in the chic furnishings and top-of-the-line appliances, like the widescreen TV that pairs with the movie-time blackout blinds in the home theater. Completely air-conditioned, guests can step out into LA sunshine on the expansive wooden deck, and dine at the alfresco table as light plays in the depths of the villa’s pristine pool.Ideal for a working vacation or professional visit, Loving LA nevertheless offers excellent access to some of the city’s best known beaches, including the very close-by Venice Beach. Some of the city’s finest cultural attractions, like the Los Angeles County Museum of Art are just a short drive away, while guests can make the most of access to a dizzying range of shopping and dining options in the locality, with fashionable Rodeo Drive also being just a short journey away by car. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Panorama Peak Penthouse, part of the One Steamboat Place complex of luxury slope-side suites and mountain lodge amenities, is a four-bedroom residence in Mountain Village, just a minute's walk from Steamboat Gondola. With stunning views that lend the suite its name, and room for fourteen mountain-loving souls, it's the ideal vacation rental for adventurous families and groups of friends seeking classy and cozy privacy at the heart of this world-class ski resort.The suite's interior living area features an entire wall of glass doors gazing out on Yampa Valley and Emerald Mountain. The doors open to a charming balcony with Viking grill, perfect for barbequing in the delicious open air. Inside, the open plan living area is perfect for fun and relaxing evenings together. The sumptuous lounge features a large sectional couch and leather armchairs facing the mounted flat screen television and a love stone hearth with gas fireplace. The kitchen is fully equipped with Viking appliances and includes a breakfast bar for three. At dinnertime, gather around the charming circular dining table for a hearty meal. With hardwood floors, beautiful rugs, lovely original paintings, and charming decorative touches, the décor conjures classic Colorado charm.Three of the suite's four bedrooms feature king size beds and ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub. The master and second bedroom, additionally, have their own gas fireplaces, while the master bedroom also has a private balcony and an office space. The fourth bedroom has two queen size bunk beds, comfortable for four adults or eight children, and an ensuite bathroom with shower/bath combo.Your vacation rental gives you access to all of the communal spaces and amenities of One Steamboat Place, including the classic and capacious Great Room, the vintage game parlor, the Little Tykes room for kids, and the outdoor pool and hot tub—perfect for a restorative evening soak.And beyond One Steamboat Place, you're within easy reach of Steamboat's myriad charms and activities. Just a minute's walk from the door is Steamboat Gondola. City Market and Old Town Steamboat Springs are a short drive away. For golf, you're less than two smiles from Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The pitch of the waterslide echoes the slope of the hills across the way at this contemporary-chic waterfront home on Lake Austin. A fountain flows at the private entrance to this gated estate, and the property only offers more ways to enjoy the water, from a two-level boathouse and a pool facing the lake to alfresco living areas by the shore. It’s 15 miles from this quiet retreat to downtown. Wander into the lake from the sand beach or take the slide directly into the water. You can also splash in the infinity pool and hot tub on the deck. Challenge friends and family to a game on the bocce court, sit down to dinner from the barbecue at the alfresco table, and linger under the stars around the firepit. After dark, serve drinks from the indoor wet bar around the pool and shuffleboard tables or around the satellite TV and Wi-Fi. Cream-colored walls, hardwood floors, and details like a turned-leg china cupboard bring a refined air to the formal dining room and an open-concept great room with a sitting area, breakfast nook, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. But this vacation rental has a playful side, too, that shows up in elements like the koi-print wallpaper tucked away in one of the bathrooms. This luxury property has 2 bedrooms with king beds and ensuite bathrooms, including the master suite, and 4 bedrooms with queen beds: 1 with an ensuite bathroom, 1 with hall bathroom access, and 2 that share a hall bathroom. On warm days, spend the day in the water and the evening at a lantern-lit waterfront restaurant along the lake. It’s 7 miles to the 4 golf courses at Barton Creek Resort, 11 miles to the 3-acre Barton Springs Pool, and 15 miles to downtown Austin, where you’ll find everything from great live music and casual taco joints to one-of-a-kind holiday souvenirs and honeymoon-worthy restaurants, plus free tours of the Texas State Capitol building.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enchanted Hollywood is a stunning 1920s mansion off Laurel Canyon. Located within minutes of myriad iconic Los Angeles attractions, the villa provides exquisite privacy and elegant comfort, with gorgeous alfresco living spaces, luxurious private spa features, and exquisitely decorated, sumptuously appointed interiors. With four deluxe king bedrooms, Enchanted Hollywood gives families, friends, and destination wedding guests a unique yet quintessential taste of Golden Age Hollywood and the unmatched contemporary style of this incomparable, world-class city.Nestled amid tall trees and garden hedges, the enchanting estate features two tiers of terrace space connected by a lovely spiral stair, ideal for plein-air relaxation and entertainment. Enjoy delicious days lounging on stylish sunbeds while savoring the dreamy waterfall's harmonious sound. Bathe in the brick-lined hot tub, absorb the sauna's therapeutic heat, and plunge into the lagoon-like swimming pool for a refreshing dip. In the afternoon, prepare a classic barbeque lunch and relish it alfresco, and enjoy your evening cocktails on the ample upper terrace overlooking the pool.Indoors, under the high ceilings and gorgeous chandelier of the luminous great room, open a bottle of fine California wine in the spacious and sumptuous lounge, staying warm by the fireplace. Prepare feasts in the bright, fully equipped kitchen, and gather in the breathtaking dining room. Late at night, retire to the comfy media lounge, where a second fireplace will keep you toasty as you watch your favorite films. Upon waking, enjoy your morning Nespresso in the lovely sun room.The villa features four spectacular bedrooms suites, all with sumptuous king beds and ensuite bathrooms. The master suite has a private balcony, while bedroom four (the primary guestroom) opens to the terrace near the sauna and hot tub; both have jetted bathtubs in their bathrooms. The master suite, occupying most of the upper floor, includes charming spiral staircases to the attic floor, where you'll find lovely furnished niches for meditation, conversation, or quiet reading.Along with exquisite privacy, Enchanted Hollywood provides an ideal location for exploring the cultural riches of Los Angeles. The Hollywood Bowl and the Grove are within about three miles, while Universal Studios, Rodeo Drive, the Getty, and Harding Golf Course are among the destinations within minutes of your door.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that there is construction underway at a neighbouring property. Dolphin Sunset will experience noise, depending on what work is being done at the time. Please inquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.An easy spot for family gatherings, this modern-meets-rustic home encapsulates the laid-back, Southern California lifestyle. Natural wood, stone, and cream-coloured minimalist décor detail the interior, while high fencing and thick shrubbery give the backyard a totally private feel. Walk for miles along the beachfront, indulge your inner shopaholic and discover new restaurants on nearby Prospect Street, or delight the kids and make the 4-minute drive to San Diego-La Jolla Underwater Park. Enormous glass doors to the front courtyard and back veranda open up completely, giving the feeling of an open, flowing space—both inside and out. Soak the day away in the azure-tiled hot tub or curl up with a book on one of the sunbeds. Tall trees, as well as a revolving parasol, provide extra shade for outdoor lounging. The Pacific ocean can be viewed from the 2nd floor terrace, with transparent railings that create an unobstructed look.While enjoying cooler evenings outside, turn on the heat lamp and save yourself the trip to grab a sweater from the upstairs bedrooms. The gourmet kitchen, which features rust-coloured granite countertops, has the option of being pre-stocked prior to your arrival. Sip on a glass of local wine and get lost in stimulating conversation in front of the patio fire pit. A natural gas barbecue and alfresco dining area makes eating with the sunset a breeze.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Originally built in 1929 and renovated with exquisite vision and care, Villa Royale exudes the glamor of Old Hollywood and the artful chic of contemporary Los Angeles. Situated within minutes of Rodeo Drive, the cloistered Beverly Hills estate features breathtaking interiors and ample alfresco living and dining areas. A four- bedroom main house and one-bedroom guesthouse accommodate ten guests in all, forming an ideal vacation rental for families and groups of friends.The villa's exterior offers ample space for cocktail parties or relaxation with loved-ones under the Southern California sky, its lush hedges and trees blending gentle shade into the delicious sunlight. A stone path crosses the lawn from the villa to the terrace, where you can sunbathe on elegant loungers, steep yourself in the hot tub, and plunge into the soothing pool. Between the guesthouse and main house are an alfresco dining patio and lounge with fire pit. Beautiful details like the lantern descending over the dining table, the lozenge-formed ivy, and the mosaic tile on the hot tub's podium enhance the yard's enchantment.Indoors, each living area and bedroom is a work of art unto itself. Folding doors invite an alfresco ambiance into the stunning main living room with fireplace and fuchsia armchairs. A luminous, high-end kitchen and adjoining dining room with zebra floors open to the patio and pool terrace. A parlor with hearth, sumptuous banquette seating, and elegant bar welcomes after-dinner cocktails.The villa's fabulous bedrooms include a king suite, three queen suites (including one in the guest house), and a charming kids' room with treehouse-style bunk bed. All enjoy ensuite bathrooms. The master suite features a quartet of crystal chandeliers and a royal armchair, while its bathroom includes a deep soaking tub.From the villa's ample motor court, you're an easy drive to countless Los Angeles attractions, from the nearby Grove and Hollywood Bowl, to the galleries of the Getty, to the fairways of Wilson & Harding Golf Course. Proximity to LAX and Bob Hope makes Villa Royale an excellent choice for destination wedding guests and easy weekend getaways.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: For a luxury ski holiday only steps from the gondola, make Buck Mountain 307 your destination. This beautiful Steamboat Springs vacation rental is part of One Steamboat Place, a slopeside resort with five-star amenities. Its open-plan interiors and four bedrooms can accommodate up to ten friends and family members—and make it easy to enjoy your time together.Your stay at One Steamboat Place includes the use of the shared outdoor pool and hot tub, fitness center, games room, wine cellar and more. When the sun is out, take in the mountain views from the villa’s furnished private deck, which has a barbecue and overlooks the pool. If you’ve spent the day in the snow, leave your gear on the boot dryers and settle in the by fireplace or flat-screen television.Each unit at One Steamboat Place is designed for stylish entertaining, with details like rich colors and natural textures, and Buck Mountain 307 is no exception. There’s plenty of space for everyone to relax or mingle in the open-plan great room, which has a sitting area next to the fireplace, a dining table that seats ten, and a fully equipped kitchen with gourmet appliances and a breakfast bar.Buck Mountain 307 has two suites with king beds and en-suite bathrooms that feel like tranquil havens after a day in the great Colorado outdoors. The other two bedrooms have two double beds and two bunk beds, respectively, and shared hall bathrooms. Kids will love bunking together—and playing on the XBox console in that bedroom.Not only is the property just a short walk from the gondola, One Steamboat Place offers a complimentary shuttle service during ski season to make getting around a snap. In the off season, however, activities like the Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course are only a short drive away. Don’t miss the area’s namesake hot springs, from the pools with waterslides at Steamboat Springs Old Town to the honeymoon-worthy natural rock tubs at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With a golf course in the foreground and the mountains in the background, White Cloud 16 Sun Valley offers iconic Idaho views—and a great location to match, with the first hole a short walk away and the Sun Valley Village center and ski resorts a few minutes away by car. A soaring great room, three bedrooms and luxury features make this vacation rental the perfect choice for a family, a group of friends or even a couple on honeymoon.The villa has its own private outdoor area with a barbecue and fireplace, as well as plenty of room to relax indoors, whether in front of the fireplace or around the kitchen table.An open layout and thoughtful furnishings give the townhouse a contemporary mountain-lodge look. The soaring ceiling in the great room echoes the wide-open Western skies, while exposed wood beams and a stone fireplace surround are classic touches. Claim a spot close to the hearth on the sectional or armchairs in the sitting area, chat with the cook from a seat at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen, and gather everyone together for a meal at the round dining table.Three suite-style bedrooms—two with king beds and one with a queen bed—ensure a comfortable holiday. The rooms are spread out over the home’s three levels, making each one a quiet haven after a day on the slopes or the course.Active guests will appreciate the villa’s location, a 2-minute walk to the nearest golf course, 3 minutes from the village center and about 1.5 miles from the closest ski area. Of course, once you’ve played one course or skied one mountain, there are other options to choose from. For a different experience, make the drive into Ketchum for shopping, gallery-hopping and dining, or to the Sawtooth Botanical Gardens for a closer look at plants that flourish in Sun Valley’s high altitudes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Originally a mining cabin, this recently re-built five bedroom is just three blocks from downtown Breckenridge, making it easy to hit the town, and the slopes, whenever you please. Harris House is luxuriously equipped to accommodate up to fourteen guests and is an ideal home base for a multi-family ski vacation. Within walking distance, you’ll find dining, boutique shops, a movie theatre, library, and Free Skier bus stop, which offers quick and easy access to Breckenridge’s most popular ski destinations.Wood, stone, and mountain-view framing glass make up the building materials of Harris House, displaying all the tropes of traditional alpine design. This house, however, has a modern spin, thanks to its sleek and stylish take on the classic atmosphere. High-end electronics, plush seating, and state of the appliances decorate the living spaces. The open concept layout and vaulted ceilings add to Harris House’s spacious feel, while the soaring mountain views add an exclamation point.Harris House is outfitted with a fully equipped modern kitchen with a dishwasher, ice maker, and wine fridge, and there’s a barbecue on the terrace. The formal dining area has seating for ten, with extra space at the kitchen’s breakfast bar and the wet bar. Outside, the hot tub is a perfect place to warm up after a day of skiing, or you could do it the old-fashioned way and light up the fire pit.The nearest ski access points to Harris House are Peak 10, Breckenridge Ski Resort, and Copper Mountain; all are within a few minutes drive. After you’ve spent a day on the mountain, reward yourself with a night in town, which is just a five-minute walk from home. Once downtown, you’ll find a wide range of dining options, from the fine cuisine at Hearthstone, to the great craft beer selection at The Canteen, you’re sure to find something that suits your mood. After dinner, check the local listings for live music or stop in for one of the latest releases at the Speakeasy Movie Theatre.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: K0001 - City Permit #3746 - TOT#3085It doesn’t get much more charming than Casa Grande Tennis Estate. This Spanish Colonial-style residence in Palm Springs will transport you with its elegant architecture and colorful detail. It’s a wonderful private hideaway for a relaxed holiday with family or a stylish base for exploring the Desert Cities with friends.Tucked behind walls for a secluded, romantic feel, the estate boasts a swimming pool, hot tub, al-fresco lounging and dining areas, an outdoor wet bar and a barbecue—and, as its name suggests, a regulation-size tennis court where you can pretend you’re at Indian Wells. Spend evenings around the firepit or inside by the wet bar, pool table, baby grand piano, TV and Wi-Fi.Rich in vibrant tile, carved wood details and refined furnishings, Casa Grande evokes a sense of traditional southern California luxury. Several living rooms give you the choice of multiple places to have a conversation or watch TV, while the dining table for fourteen is perfect for getting everyone together. The fully equipped kitchen is equally inviting, with a generous center island.There are five bedrooms in the main house at this expansive vacation rental, one in a first casita and two in a second casita. All five main-house bedrooms have king beds; three have en-suite bathrooms and two share a hall bathroom. The first casita has one bedroom with a queen bed, an en-suite bathroom and a kitchenette—ideal for couples wanting a honeymoon-style escape. The second casita has two bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, plus a shared kitchenette.Casa Grande Tennis Estate is located in The Mesa, an exclusive Palm Springs neighborhood known for being a favorite with celebrities. From here, it’s a 10-minute walk to some of the hottest spots on South Palm Springs and a 5-minute drive to shopping, dining and entertainment in downtown Palm Springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Mountain meets mod at this classic chalet with a mid-century twist. It has the signatures of a ski chalet—cozy wood paneling, a stone fireplace, and peak views—but mixes in cool pieces like Wishbone chairs and branch chandeliers. A location in Vail Village means you can mix up your stay, too, with skiing a 4-minute drive away and shopping and dining at your doorstep.Guests are welcome to splash in the swimming pool or soak in the hot tub at The Sebastian resort, both of which are heated year-round. Spend summer evenings sipping drinks on the villa’s private balcony facing the mountains and winter nights snuggled up by the fireplace inside.A wall of windows lets light stream into the great room, turning the wood floors and paneling a warm shade of honey. A tuxedo sofa, Wishbone chairs, and tractor stools bring a little mid-century flair to the living area, dining table, and the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Skiers and boarders will appreciate that the nearest lift, Eagle Bahn Gondola 19 at Vail Ski Resort, is only a 4-minute drive from the villa. After the last run of the day, stop to drop off your gear, then step out into Vail Village for a glass at a wine bar, a casual meal at a café, or an evening of live music. If you’re staying in the summer, it’s a 3-minute drive to the Betty Ford Gardens and 5 minutes to teeing off at the Vail Golf Club.Business License: STL002852Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Just minutes from the shops, restaurants, and nightlife of Ketchum’s downtown, this luxurious Mountain home is ready to host your next adventurous vacation. With its central location, you’re never more than a few minutes from ski access, golf courses, hiking, and Main street. Whether you’re planning a family getaway or golf or ski-trip with friends, this mountain home has three luxurious bedrooms and an additional shared bedroom, bringing total accommodations up to twelve.Borrowing concepts from the traditional American ski lodge, this mountain home uses wood, stone, and cozy furniture to create a warm, welcoming environment. The rustic elements of the design are finely polished, adding a modern, elegant touch. An open concept living room promotes a great social atmosphere, joining the kitchen, dining area, and lounge. Dark wood cabinetry and granite countertops in the kitchen are the perfect contrast to the high-end stainless steel appliances. In the formal dining area, there is space for ten and extra seating at the kitchen breakfast bar.After dinner, head to the television lounge and settle in for a movie with the family, the “L” shaped couch is extra-cozy and has space for the whole group. You could also take the party out to the terrace, with an alfresco dining set and heat lamps, you can use it all year round.The master bedroom features a king-sized bed, walk-in closet, jetted tub, balcony, and all of the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. If you need some additional space, there’s an extra room with four twin beds and a sofa bed, great for kids to share or unexpected company.After you’ve explored Ketchum, take a short drive out of town, and you’ll find plenty of exciting things to do. Bigwood and Elkhorn golf courses are just a few miles away. And for quick and easy ski access, Bald Mountain and Dollar Mountain have chairlifts, both just under two miles from your luxurious alpine vacation home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Whether it’s a family ski vacation or mountain getaway with friends, make Echo Base at Shockhill Landing your headquarters. Part of the exclusive Shock Hill development, the modern four-bedroom duplex is close to both a gondola stop and downtown Breckenridge and has gorgeous mountain views. Its stylish interiors are filled with light and luxe features—a perfect setting for an unforgettable stay.No matter what the season, Echo Base is ready to welcome guests after a long day in the snow or on the trails, with a hot tub with a view of the gondola, gas barbecue, deck and balcony with mountain views. Get ready for another big day by relaxing in front of the fireplace with a glass from the wine fridge, switching on the PlayStation 3 for a few rounds of gaming or catching up via Wi-Fi. For your convenience, there are laundry facilities for wet gear and a kitchenette for easy snacking.With their high ceilings, generous windows and polished stone and wood textures, the villa’s custom-designed interiors could define modern mountain style. In the open-plan living room, dining room and kitchen, contemporary touches like a tufted chaise lounge and metal-topped coffee table keep the vibe from veering rustic. Warm-toned rugs and chair upholstery add warmth, as does the rich wood paneling in the fully equipped kitchen.Echo Base has four bedrooms: one on the main level and three on the lower level. The main-floor master suite has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and its own gas fireplace; another lower-level suite also has a king bed and en-suite bathroom. The third bedroom has two twin beds and an en-suite bathroom, and the fourth bedroom has two twin-over-twin bunk beds and a shared bathroom.Given the gondola views from the villa, it’s no surprise that it’s just a 2-minute walk to a gondola stop. By car, it’s a 5-minute drive to the main street in Breckenridge, where you’ll find shops, restaurants and galleries in a charming downtown. It’s a 1-mile drive to the BreckConnect Gondola, 1.5 miles to sledding and tubing at Carter Park, and just under 2 miles to skating at the Breckenridge Ice Arena. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 105-mile drive from the property to Denver International Airport.Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Listen to the water burble and glimpse the Tetons in the distance from Fish Creek Lodge 75. Set on the banks of the east fork of its namesake creek, in the exclusive Shooting Star community, this Wyoming vacation rental is perfectly situated for exploring the towns of Wilson and Jackson, as well as Grand Teton National Park. Its three bedrooms have room for up to eight friends or family members to join in the adventure.After a day of hiking, golfing or sightseeing, heat up the barbecue for dinner at the al-fresco table, linger into the evening around the outdoor fireplace or soak in the private outdoor hot tub. If you’ve come on a ski holiday, finish a day on the slopes in front of the wood-burning fireplace inside, sipping a glass from the wine fridge and watching TV or browsing via Wi-Fi.Designed by local architect John Carney, Fish Creek Lodge 75 offers 3,400 square feet of thoughtfully designed living space, with room to gather together or enjoy a quiet moment. Drawing inspiration from traditional mountain lodges, the villa’s great room is rustic yet sophisticated, with a stone fireplace surround and reclaimed wood covering the TV. The open-concept sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen give everyone the luxury of each other’s company.The lodge has two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own gas fireplace, and one bedroom with two twin bunk beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and TVs.A path connects Fish Creek Lodge 75 to the nearest towns and to the entrance of Grand Teton National Park. The villa is also less than a 10-minute walk from shopping, dining and skiing at Jackson Hole Mountain Resort, Teton Village and the Shooting Star Golf Course. For an unforgettable day trip, you can’t go wrong with Granite Hot Springs for a honeymoon-worthy soak or Yellowstone National Park for iconic scenery.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Settle in by the fireplace after a long day on the slopes of Park City Mountain at this ski-in/ski-out condo in Canyons Village. Gaze out the window off the elevated balcony, and tell tales of an exciting day while you take in the mountain view. Reward yourself with a soothing dip in the private hot tub. Then, walk down to Canyons Village for a farm-to-table dinner at the local steakhouse.It’s got the dark woods, granite countertops, plush furniture, and mountain views of a traditional ski lodge, but Apex Plaza puts a fresh, modern spin on the style. Gather in the open-concept living room for a drink at the kitchen’s bar while the chef in your group prepares dinner. Better yet, pick up something fresh from a local market and do some grilling on the terrace. After dinner, hang out in the games room or burn off some calories in the home gym. If the weather permits, swim a few laps in the shared pool.Make sure to check the local listings if you’re a fan of live music. Park City has a bustling concert schedule all-year-round. If you’re in the mood to shop, do some antiquing, or check out the latest ski gear, take a stroll down Historic Main Street. In the warmer months, golf, mountain biking, and rock climbing are great ways to experience Utah’s rugged terrain.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Calling all outdoor enthusiasts: your choice of watersports and a private boat dock await on rippling Lake Austin. A contemporary yet comfortable interior is comprised of plump leather furniture, stainless steel accents, and warm wooden details. Located mere miles from the heart of downtown, this serene getaway is close to modern museums, a thriving entertainment scene, and piquant Texas flavours.A natural stone pathway leads to the double front doors. Soaring windows allow natural light to stream in from all angles. Inside, artful light fixtures and geometric décor add character to the flowing living space. An alfresco kitchen is an easy spot to prepare lunch while the kids splash around in the swimming pool. Later, uncork a bottle of Cabernet Sauvignon while gazing up at the starlit sky from the rooftop patio. Towering trees form a dense perimeter while tropical greenery surrounds the estate and potted plants bring the garden indoors. The views of the city are not to be missed from nearby Mount Bonnell’s peak. Hiking and biking trails crisscross through Zilker Metropolitan Park where you can also bathe in natural springs, rent a kayak, play sand volleyball, or ride the miniature Zilker Zephyr train.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: If you’ve got to have the sand in your toes and the breeze on your skin, look no farther than La Costa Beach House. There’s nothing but a glass railing between you and the beach at this oceanfront Malibu vacation rental. Reserve this luxury property for a sunny getaway in this celeb-favorite enclave, or for a holiday spent exploring greater Los Angeles.The residence opens to a spectacular beachfront deck with loungers, al-fresco dining for six and steps down to the sand. If the breeze off the water gets chilly in the evening, flip on the heat lamps or step inside and relax by the Apple TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi or sip a California vintage from the wine fridge.Wall-to-wall, floor-to-ceiling glass brings the ocean and sunset views into the home’s gorgeous open-concept great room. A cream sofa, ombré blue area rug and azure chairs in the living and dining areas nod to the classic seaside color scheme of white and blue, while a gas- and wood-burning fireplace lends a cozy feel. The fully equipped kitchen is equally inspiring, with a spacious breakfast bar and state-of-the-art appliances.La Costa Beach House has three bedrooms with private en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed and balcony, one bedroom with a queen bed and one bedroom with two queen beds. The fourth bedroom has a double bed and shares access to a hall bathroom.Whether you’re traveling as a family, with friends or on honeymoon, you’ll find plenty to see and do in southern California. In addition to La Costa Beach, where the villa is located, it’s easy to explore three other Malibu beaches. The villa is also a short drive to the masterpieces at the Getty Villa, the hiking trails in Topanga State Park and the thrills of Universal Studios.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Bison Crossing is a unique luxury accommodation situated on Main Street in historic downtown Breckenridge, just steps from the Breck Connect Gondola. Despite its proximity to all the action in town, this stunning vacation rental still offers some of the best mountain views in Breckenridge. Come to a place where ski boots and cowboy hats are likely companions and experience the best of Colorado with Luxury Retreats!After a day of golf, hiking, skiing or snowboarding, nothing beats the feeling of being able to slip into the therapeutic bubbles of the private outdoor hot tub. The grounds at Bison Crossing also feature a lovely alfresco dining set and a gas barbeque on the spacious terrace. Interior perks include heated floors, premium cable television, DVD player and complimentary Wi-Fi.The open plan kitchen spills into cozy living and dining areas. The living space includes stately furniture centered around a stone fireplace. The gourmet kitchen features granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and only high end finishes. The lower level offers a separate den that includes an elegant wet bar with a wine cooler, mini fridge and granite countertops.Three exquisite bedrooms and some additional bedding options accommodate up to ten guests at Bison Crossing. The master bedroom is secluded on a private level and features the deck with the hot tub alongside expansive views of the ski resort and Ten Mile Range. A steam shower and gas fireplace are other highlights in this master suite. With the extra trundle and queen sofa bed in the bunk room, the chalet adapts to the requirements of every group.At Bison Crossing, a private two-car garage offers parking right in the heart of Breckenridge – a rare find in itself! When straying from this home, you will find that you are literally just steps from all of the shopping and dining in town. In the fall, the Breckenridge Oktoberfest sprawls into Main Street and welcomes live music, dancing and food for a cultural experience during your stay. Bison Crossing makes a great bet for a family holiday, a couples’ retreat or even an unforgettable alpine honeymoon. Have your vacation, your way!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Have some Texas-sized fun at this waterfront villa along the shores of Lake Austin. Superbly equipped with family-friendly games, foodie-friendly appliances, and a fabulous outdoor entertainment area, this vacation rental has everything you need for a memorable reunion or inspiring retreat. Hiking, swimming, golf, and the world-class live music and eateries of Austin are an easy drive away.The villa inspires open-air, riverfront delights with plentiful options for relaxation, dining, and festivities. Next to the private dock is a glass-enclosed boathouse with ping-pong table, as well as a sundeck with loungers overlooking the water. The ample terrace features a pool, hot tub, sun loungers, and fire pit, while the bocce court below has trellised lighting for nighttime tournaments. A full kitchen with barbecue, fireplace, wet bar, and plentiful seating commands the scene.Inside, a lounge and pool table are perched between the open gourmet kitchen and terrace, creating a lovely social scene while dinner is cooking. Multiple lounge areas allow the cocktail party to spread itself out, while the large TV is perfect for family movie night. There is also an office for business travelers or students, and a sauna for working up a sweat before a moonlit dip.Family-friendly accommodations include a charming kids' bunkroom plus 5 adult-friendly bedrooms: 3 with king beds, 2 with queens. One of the queen rooms enjoys a private entrance, lounge, and kitchenette. The master opens directly to the pool and includes a private living area and spacious bathroom with soaking tub.Perched above the Lake Austin portion of the Colorado River, this villa places you in the lush heart of Texas Hill Country, with a plethora of parks, swimming holes, and hiking trails within 5 or 10 miles of your door. When it's time to explore the Live Music Capital of the World, you're just 9 miles from Zilker Park and 13 from Downtown Austin.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Green hills, valleys and vineyards complement the namesake beds of lavender blooming at this quintessential California retreat. The setting puts you 1,600 feet above Sonoma’s Valley of the Moon, and the architecture encourages indoor-outdoor living, whether that’s splashing in the pool or sipping wine on the porch. Glen Ellen, about 7 miles away, has a bevy of wine bars and a state historic park.The 200 lavender plants perfume the air wafting over the villa’s swimming pool, al-fresco lounging and dining areas, and garden. As the shadows in the valley grow long, heat up the barbecue for dinner, then bring your wine glasses inside to savour in front of the satellite TV or as you catch up on your feeds over Wi-Fi.A wraparound porch flanks the open-concept, double-height great room inside this vacation rental. A fireplace with built-in bookshelves makes the sitting area into a cozy corner, as does banquette seating in the dining area. Perch on a stool at the bar in the fully equipped kitchen or, if you’re the cook, watch the valley views out the windows along with whatever you’ve got in the pan.This luxury property has three queen size beds, two private en-suite bathrooms, and air conditioning, making it ideal for groups of three couples, friends, or extended family on holiday together. Neutral-toned bedding is a soft backdrop for landscape paintings and botanical artwork.Wine lovers will find their joy in the area’s wineries and tasting rooms, and at the wine bars in town. Beyond the vineyards, you can sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner at a bistro in downtown Glen Ellen, book a horseback ride through the area’s verdant scenery, or follow in the author’s footsteps at Jack London State Historic Park, which was once London’s ranch.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy a ski vacation with family and friends at Emerald Mountain 702: a residence designed to bring everyone together. The open floor plan, gourmet kitchen, private deck and four spacious bedrooms have room for parties of ten on holiday together. As part of the exclusive One Steamboat Place community, this luxury Steamboat Springs vacation rental is close to the gondola, shopping, dining and more.Emerald Mountain 702 opens to its own deck with a barbecue, and has a fireplace, flat-screen television and wine cooler for indoor entertaining. Guests are welcome to use the shared outdoor heated pool and hot tub at One Steamboat Place, and complimentary shuttle service is available during the winter.The heart of the villa is the open-plan great room, which has sitting and dining areas, a fully equipped kitchen and enough space for everyone to gather. Nearly wall-to-wall windows look out over the pool and valley, and deep colors, plush fabrics and a stone fireplace create an atmosphere of slopeside luxury. The kitchen is a dream for cooks and diners alike, with gourmet appliances and plenty of seating at the breakfast bar.The four bedrooms at Emerald Mountain 702 include two master suites, a queen bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and one room with two double beds and access to a hall bathroom. Each master suite has a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and one even ventures into honeymoon-suite territory with a fireplace and hot tub.The villas at Emerald Mountain are a 1-minute walk from the Steamboat gondola, which will whisk you to some of the best skiing in Colorado. It’s also a short drive to nearby shopping and dining and, in the warmer months, Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course. Don’t miss the area’s namesake springs, whether the family-friendly Steamboat Springs Old Town or the more romantic natural-rock pools at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Double glass doors invite vistas of snow-covered fields and Colorado peaks inside this lofty Steamboat Springs home. Its angular contemporary architecture makes for airy spaces on a grand scale, but even the smallest details have been seen to, like the glass fireplace screen. Walk 4 minutes to Trailhead Lodge and board the Wildhorse Gondola on your way to the day’s first ski run. Leave gear in the mudroom before settling in for an apres-ski soak in the private outdoor hot tub or facing off against friends and family over the ping-pong and foosball tables inside. Guests of this luxury property are also welcome at the heated swimming pool and hot tub at Trailhead Lodge. A two-story ceiling and double doors to the terrace flood this vacation rental’s great room with light. Leather seating is a warm, inviting touch in the sitting and dining areas, while a marble breakfast bar lends polish to the fully equipped kitchen. There’s a separate lower-level media room with a wet bar, and for larger parties on holiday together, a bunk room with 3 double bunk beds. This villa is a 4-minute walk from Trailhead Lodge. From here, take the Wildhorse Gondola up to Gondola Square, which is both ski-resort base and a hub of shopping and dining. After a day in the powder, go for a sleigh-ride dinner, drive into downtown Steamboat Springs, or reserve a honeymoon-worthy snowshoe by moonlight. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Banner Haus is a stunning mountain chalet at Deer Valley Si Resort in Utah, with ski-in/ski-out access to Banner Trail. Situated in the Empire Pass community—a high-end enclave about five minutes from downtown Park City—the villa features spectacular interior and alfresco living areas, as well as five deluxe bedrooms accommodating fourteen guests.The chalet's open-plan great room invites you to sumptuous evenings after an unforgettable day on the mountain. Ample windows invite exquisite alpine light into the home. Kindle a fire in the beautiful stone fireplace, and sip wine on comfortable sofas while screening a favorite show on the large screen. Prepare delicious meals in the fully equipped kitchen, serving appetizers and cocktails at the five-person bar, and gather in the beautiful dining room for a hearty feast. At night, cuddle up in the extraordinary media room. The villa also features a yoga room, and there is a charming and luminous breakfast nook by the kitchen—the ideal place to start your day. Outstanding AV equipment, heating, air conditioning, and an elevator ensure total comfort during your stay. At extra cost, chef and spa services are available, as well.Lovely alfresco living and dining spaces invite you to relish the fresh Rocky Mountain air. Soothe your body with an evening dip in the hot tub. Fire up the barbeque and sip cocktails on the balcony while beholding the mountain vistas. On clear winter nights, sip hot cocoa by the fire pit.The spacious and cozy bedroom suites provide the perfect settings for afternoon downtime and peaceful nights. There are four suites with king beds, and a kids' room with two bunk beds. All of the suites have ensuite bathrooms. The master suite enjoys mountain views, direct access to the balcony, a walk-in closet, and a jetted tub in its bathroom.Banner Haus balances exquisite privacy and seclusion with outstanding convenience. In addition to ski-in/ski-out access to Banner Trail, you're just ten minutes from the bases of Deer Valley Resort and Park City Resort. Park Silly Sunday Market, Historic Main Street, and Park City Golf Course are all within five to ten minutes of your door.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The City of Palm Springs ID# 2891Nestled in the majestic San Jacinto mountains, Villa Cahuilla sits above the city, while providing easy access to top golf courses, Moorten Botanical Garden and Palm Springs. Sitting poolside, or in the spa, while overlooking the city, defines the carefree spirit of Palm Springs. Exquisite design allows seamless indoor & outdoor living, while gorgeous gardens populate the grounds. Live it up with Luxury Retreats!The heated swimming pool features four waterfall fountain features and offers unobstructed views of Palm Springs and the surrounding desert. The private grounds feature four separate outdoor fire features, ancient rock formations and stunning multi-tiered gardens that include mature cacti. Dine alfresco at the outdoor table for twelve, or belly up to the outdoor bar and barbeque. The property also showcases an eight person hot tub, literally perched on the edge of the mountain. The hot tub's fire feature and multi-color mood lighting are perfect complements for an evening of champagne and stargazing.This vacation rental is set apart by its sublime, romantic ambience. The lighting schemes and fireplaces cast a dreamy spell amid sparkling contemporary furniture, especially as juxtaposed against the lighting in the pool and spa area. The striking, modern interior is luxurious and elegantly laid out. Open spaces offer opportunities for time together as a group, while many nooks and crannies are there to be explored, such as the hanging day bed in the hot tub area.Four exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. Two include en-suite bathrooms, and two share a Jack and Jill. The master suite features a king sized bed, dual-head rain shower, dual vanity, fireplace and terrace. Each bedroom has a television, while the second suite provides direct access to the pool terrace. The third and fourth bedrooms also offer walk-in closets.During your stay at Villa Cahuilla, you will find plenty of hiking and walking trails close by, while downtown and the best golf course in the valley are just a jaunt away. We recommend this villa for a family holiday, a group of friends or a special celebration such as a wedding or anniversary. Have your vacation, your way in the epitome of Palm Springs, carefully reimagined to foster an exclusive resort experience for only the most discerning guests. The glory of California’s Desert Cities await!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This breathtaking villa is situated on a serene, one-acre estate along Cypress Avenue in San Diego, a short walk from Balboa Park. Gracefully fusing interior and exterior living spaces, the designer home's amenities include a swimming pool with three in-water cabanas, a voluminous spa, an eight-person Swedish barrel sauna, and a stunning gourmet kitchen. Five bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms comfortably accommodate families and groups of friends up to ten in size.The expansive, indoor/outdoor venue is ideal for special occasions, festive entertainment, or intimate relaxation. Savor the Southern California light on king-size sunbeds in the cabanas, before plunging into the sparkling pool. Enjoy alfresco meals in the shade of the veranda, and ascend to the upper balcony for sunset drinks. Linger outdoors in the enchanting nighttime lighting, sipping wine by the fire pit or gathering in the twelve-person spa for a soothing soak.Folding glass doors create a seamless flow of space between the terrace and interior. The fabulous open kitchen boasts chef-grade appliances and an extensive bar area, including a lovely island for cocktails or casual meals. Beside the kitchen is a comfortable TV lounge, while a separate living room welcomes toasty evenings by the fire. The dining room seats ten amid exquisite artwork and garden views. Throughout the home, luminous white surfaces accentuate the dreamy natural light and gallery-quality art collection, which balances modernist and Buddhist traditions. The villa is fully air-conditioned and includes a fitness room.The six bedrooms include five with king beds and one with a queen, while a Murphy bed in the office can accommodate additional guests. Five of the rooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms, and three open to balconies. The spacious master suite boasts an open-concept balcony with a lounge and stand-alone tub overlooking the pool.Nestled on a private cul-de-sac neighboring Balboa Park, the villa possesses an almost rural serenity near the heart of San Diego. The park features 1,200 acres of gardens, trails, and family-friendly attractions including San Diego Zoo. Myriad other activities and destinations are within a short drive of the villa, including Seaport Village and Coronado Golf Course. Proximity to San Diego International Airport ensures easy arrival for wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Book the ultimate ski-in, ski-out holiday at Beaver Mountain 411. This luxury Steamboat Springs vacation rental is part of One Steamboat Place, an exclusive community at the base of the gondola. Enjoy easy access to the slopes during the day, and gorgeous open-plan living spaces in the evenings.Guests of Beaver Mountain 411 are welcome to use the community’s shared outdoor pool and hot tub, fitness center, games room and other beautifully appointed spaces. For private entertaining, the villa has its own furnished deck with a barbecue, as well as a fireplace, flat-screen television, wine cooler and Wi-Fi.After a day on the slopes, the villa’s open-plan great room is a warm, welcome respite. Cozy up to the fireplace and television on the roomy sectional or leather armchairs, prepare a well-deserved feast using the professional-grade appliances in the fully equipped kitchen, and settle in to enjoy around a dining table that seats ten. As the sun sets, you can watch the lights go on in the Yampa Valley below through the glass doors to the deck.Four bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to eight friends or family on a Colorado adventure. There are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite with its own fireplace, and one bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom. The fourth bedroom has two double beds and a shared hall bath, and is perfect for older kids who want their own space.Each morning, put on your ski boots in the villa and make the 1-minute walk to the gondola at Steamboat Ski Resort. In the winter, One Steamboat Place provides complimentary shuttle service; in the summer, you’ll hardly need the shuttle to make the short drive to local attractions like the Rollingstone Ranch Golf Club. If you need a break from skiing, hiking, biking or other outdoor activities, treat yourself to a family-friendly day out at Steamboat Springs Old Town or a honeymoon-worthy soak in the mineral waters of Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
